about_the_game:
Kids land on a promising planet but so did dangerous Astro Balls!



Lane defense genre is back with new twists and turns! Are you ready?



FEATURES

  • Plant traps: Turret, Popcorn Machine, Bomb, Wall, Spikes, Moving Platform and Mystery Box
  • Buy even more traps with your Popcorn
  • Upgrade traps with update points!
  • Wave Rewards! Random prizes make each run different
  • Skill Cards: use stars to buy cards to customize your personal playstyle



  • Over 400 ferocious enemy variations: squishy and slimy Astro Balls, armored space drillers,
    exploding enemies, and big bad worms. Contains farts!
  • Move the kid: choose which lane you defend.
  • Ultimates: Clean waves with Laser, Snowball and help of your buddies.
  • Customize your Kid: Hair, clothing colors, skin tone, boots, you name it. All F2P accessible.
  • Hilarious sounds and graphics
  • Hours of gameplay, post launch updates! Join in!



    Game Modes

  • Normal levels: collect Stars to progress your customizable Skill Cards build. Each level has pre-set board states and interesting enemy waves to tickle your brains.
  • Hard levels: Like normal levels, but LOT harder. Can you beat those?
  • Endless Mode. The waves. Do. Not. Stop.

Early Access plan

UPDATE 1
  • Endless game optimization
  • New Endless game Wave Reward Cards
  • Achievement updates

UPDATE 2
  • Level Builder early test
  • Achievement updates

UPDATE 3
  • New Skill Cards
  • Full controller support
  • Shop optimization
  • Achievement updates

UPDATE 4
  • Final version of Level Builder
  • Shared Levels
  • Localization

Hotfixes and important updates are patched as needed and patch notes are gathered weekly. As we approach version 1.0 launch we might add to this Roadmap.

Join our discord community


About the Game

Lane defense genre is back with new twists and turns! Are you ready?

  • Over 400 ferocious enemy variations: squishy and slimy Astro Balls, armored space drillers,
    exploding enemies, and big bad worms. Contains farts!
  • Move the kid: choose which lane you defend.
  • Ultimates: Clean waves with Laser, Snowball and help of your buddies.
  • Customize your Kid: Hair, clothing colors, skin tone, boots, you name it. All F2P accessible.
  • Hilarious sounds and graphics
  • Hours of gameplay, post launch updates! Join in!



    Game Modes

  • Normal levels: collect Stars to progress your customizable Skill Cards build. Each level has pre-set board states and interesting enemy waves to tickle your brains.
  • Hard levels: Like normal levels, but LOT harder. Can you beat those?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.13
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Mac compatible

name: Astro Battlers TD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: No NASA spare computer required
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any modern decent CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: modern separate / good integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Astro Battlers TD is Lane Defense game where you can build your gameplay by using Skill Cards. Movable kid, trap upgrades, endless mode, meta progression, ultimate abilities and more! Hop in and let's save the planet!
